message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you take 10%.  We can negotiate from here.
My turn! How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  It's more than you offered, and time is ticking...
Let's compromise. I'll take 55%, you take 45%.  We both get more this way, and we can avoid wasting more time with inflation.
Okay, let's speed this up. I'll take the same split you just offered me - 55/45.  No need to drag this out further.
